name: Tetras (irafunesta)
description:
TETRAS

A Tetris clone for testing my homemade javascript engine using HTML 5, JS and Canvas for the graphics.

Arrow to move the tetraminos, A or D to rotate the piece. Use Enter and Esc to navigate.

Credits :

Programming : Guidi Simone

Tiles : by antony999k  from OpenGameArt.org

blocks2 : by GameArtForge from OpenGameArt.org

Music : Melody Loop mix 130 bpm by ▂▃▄▅▆▇█▓▒░DAVEJF░▒▓█▇▆▅▄▃▂

SFX : 

    Blip_C_03 by cabled_mess, 

    Perc Bip by SpiceProgram

    menuSel by RunnerPack

If you have any suggestions or comments on the game or the engine don't esitate to send me a message. If you want to have the engine source just contact me.
